actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority relating to School Assistance in Federally Affected Areas (deferral No. D76-42) which is proposed by the President in his special message of July 25, 1975, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.text: Disapproves the deferral of budget authority relating to school assistance in federally affected areas (deferral numbered D76-42) which was proposed by the President in his special message of July 25, 1975, transmitted under the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the deferral of budget authority relating to School Assistance in Federally Affected Areas (deferral No. D76-42) which is proposed by the President in his special message of July 25, 1975, transmitted under section 1013 of the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
